rows.label: tev018701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Tauler about this building.

rows.label: tev018701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Tauler if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Tauler about this building.

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Tauler about the new arms manufacturer.

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Tauler if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Tauler about the new arms manufacturer.

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Tauler if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Tauler about the new arms manufacturer.

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Tauler if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0101
rows.name: Ask Tauler about the new arms manufacturer.

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0111
rows.name: Ask Tauler if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0121
rows.name: Ask Tauler about the new arms manufacturer.

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0131
rows.name: Ask Tauler if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0141
rows.name: Ask Tauler about the new arms manufacturer.

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0151
rows.name: Ask Tauler if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0161
rows.name: Ask Tauler about the arms manufacturers.

rows.label: tev018701_SEL0171
rows.name: Ask Tauler if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0001
rows.name: This is where the arms manufacturers are based.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0002
rows.name:
This building is for all the companies that are involved
in the research, development, and sale of weapons
and armor for BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0003
rows.name: Ah, but you're not a BLADE yourself, are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0004
rows.name:
Forgive me. I assumed that you were officially
registered by the way you were armed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0008
rows.name:
My professional duties include recruiting BLADEs for
miranium-gathering missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0009
rows.name:
Unfortunately, I've had few interested parties,
as most BLADEs are busy installing data probes,
battling tyrants, and performing other vital duties.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0010
rows.name:
But if you should find yourself with miranium to spare,
might I invite you to accept one of our assignments
from Mission Control?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0011
rows.name:
Needless to say, we will pay a fair price for the
miranium as a mission reward. I do hope you'll
consider this proposition.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0016
rows.name:
I understand you've officially enrolled as a BLADE,
[ST:gender p1=Mr. p2=Ms. ] [ST:playername ]. My congratulations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0017
rows.name: This is where the arms manufacturers are based.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0018
rows.name:
This building is for all the companies that are involved
in the research, development, and sale of weapons
and armor for BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0019
rows.name:
At the moment, that includes but two companies:
Sakuraba Industries and the Grenada Galactic Group.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0020
rows.name:
However, we are taking great strides to recruit
additional businesses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0021
rows.name:
I am confident that one day this building's directory of
occupants will be filled with the names of corporations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0026
rows.name:
A new company by the name of "Meredith & Co."
has moved into the building.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0027
rows.name:
From what I understand, they analyze Ganglion
armor in order to reverse-engineer new weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0028
rows.name:
This is one way in which arms manufacturers utilize the
information that BLADE brings us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0029
rows.name:
In a similar manner, we have high hopes for other
BLADE activities—such as expanding FrontierNav,
battling xenoforms, and seeking pieces of the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0030
rows.name:
We feel that all of these actions will help encourage
additional arms manufacturers to open up shop here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0035
rows.name:
Might I share with you a behind-the-scenes story
regarding the inception of Meredith & Co.?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0036
rows.name:
The company's concept was to exploit technology
acquired from the Ganglion units you defeated.
At first, this proposal was highly controversial.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0037
rows.name:
However, Defense Secretary Nagi stepped in and said
that there was nothing wrong with borrowing ideas
from the enemy to ensure our own survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0038
rows.name:
After that, opposition to the idea quickly dissipated.
The man clearly speaks with the voice of experience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0040
rows.name:
Candid & Credible House of Fine Wares is the
building's newest occupant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0041
rows.name:
The company appears to be devoted entirely to
manufacturing Ma-non-designed ground gear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0042
rows.name:
This is one way in which arms manufacturers utilize the
information that BLADE brings us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0043
rows.name:
In a similar manner, we have high hopes for other
BLADE activities—such as expanding FrontierNav,
battling xenoforms, and seeking pieces of the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0044
rows.name:
We feel that all of these actions will help encourage
additional arms manufacturers to open up shop here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0050
rows.name:
Might I share with you a behind-the-scenes story
regarding the inception of Candid & Credible?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0051
rows.name:
The Ma-non seem to have a deep fascination for Earth
culture, and have apparently spent a great deal of time
studying our archives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0052
rows.name:
Apparently it was the costumes from fictional universes
that struck the deepest chord with them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0053
rows.name:
And so it seems that much of the inspiration for
Candid & Credible's designs comes from Earth films
and cartoons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0058
rows.name:
The Nopon Commerce Guild has become the newest
occupant of this building.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0059
rows.name:
It's a development group that utilizes the secrets and
connections of the Nopon living throughout Mira.
...I hope they're up to the task.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0060
rows.name:
This is one way in which arms manufacturers utilize the
information that BLADE brings us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0061
rows.name:
In a similar manner, we have high hopes for other
BLADE activities—such as expanding FrontierNav,
battling xenoforms, and seeking pieces of the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0062
rows.name:
We feel that all of these actions will help encourage
additional arms manufacturers to open up shop here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0068
rows.name:
Might I share with you a behind-the-scenes story
regarding the Nopon Commerce Guild?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0069
rows.name:
The Nopon apparently owe their longevity to their
tendency to flee instead of fight, but in the past there
were some who demonstrated great valor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0070
rows.name:
They retain their technology from that period even
today, which is why they're able to craft weapons
despite not actually using them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0071
rows.name:
Still, if they're capable of crafting such weapons,
why not give their all and join us in combat?
...But I suppose we cannot force them to fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0077
rows.name:
A company named Orphean Technologies has joined
us here in the building.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0078
rows.name:
I understand that they primarily intend to develop
new augments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0079
rows.name:
This is one way in which arms manufacturers utilize the
information that BLADE brings us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0080
rows.name:
In a similar manner, we have high hopes for other
BLADE activities—such as expanding FrontierNav,
battling xenoforms, and seeking pieces of the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0081
rows.name:
We feel that all of these actions will help encourage
additional arms manufacturers to open up shop here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0086
rows.name:
Might I share with you a behind-the-scenes story
regarding the inception of Orphean Technologies?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0087
rows.name:
The Orphe were apparently forced to develop weapons
by the Ganglion, a task they took to with logical
efficiency.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0088
rows.name:
The more powerful their weapons, the more pleased the
Ganglion became—which increased the chances of their
own survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0089
rows.name:
And no motivation is more fundamental to living beings
than survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0095
rows.name:
A new business named Factory 1.21 has moved into
the building.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0096
rows.name:
It seems to be a development partnership between a
Ma-non and a xenoform who suddenly appeared in
the industrial district one day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0097
rows.name:
This is one way in which arms manufacturers utilize the
information that BLADE brings us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0098
rows.name:
In a similar manner, we have high hopes for other
BLADE activities—such as expanding FrontierNav,
battling xenoforms, and seeking pieces of the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0099
rows.name:
We feel that all of these actions will help encourage
additional arms manufacturers to open up shop here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0105
rows.name:
Might I share with you a behind-the-scenes story
regarding the inception of Factory 1.21?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0106
rows.name:
Professor B, the company's director of development,
is neither a Ma-non nor a Prone. Instead, he claims
to be a time traveler from the future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0107
rows.name:
He is apparently unable to return to his own time,
and so is temporarily cooperating with us to ensure
that humanity is not destroyed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0108
rows.name: I wonder if we humans still exist in his time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0110
rows.name:
A company known as "Six Stars" has moved into
the building.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0111
rows.name:
In an unusual twist, the Wrothians have established
a business to support BLADE, in hopes that it will
provide a steady stream of revenue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0112
rows.name:
This is one way in which arms manufacturers utilize the
information that BLADE brings us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0113
rows.name:
In a similar manner, we have high hopes for other
BLADE activities—such as expanding FrontierNav,
battling xenoforms, and seeking pieces of the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0114
rows.name:
We feel that all of these actions will help encourage
additional arms manufacturers to open up shop here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0119
rows.name:
Might I share with you a behind-the-scenes story
regarding the inception of Six Stars?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0120
rows.name:
The planet of Wroth has long been home to a
monopolistic enterprise known as Six Stars.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0121
rows.name:
It persisted even after the Wrothians became affiliated
with the Ganglion and brought their products here to
Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0122
rows.name:
When the alliance was signed with us humans,
Six Stars opened a branch in New LA to facilitate
not just deliveries, but technological exchanges as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0128
rows.name:
We began encouraging arms corporations to open here
in hopes of doing what little we could to protect our
brave BLADE operatives on the battlefield.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0129
rows.name:
But to see every space on the office directory filled
with a different company has been a deeply gratifying
experience for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0130
rows.name:
We owe this to all of BLADE, but especially to you,
[ST:gender p1=Mr. p2=Ms. ] [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0131
rows.name:
Is...is someone slicing onions? *sniff*
N-no! I mustn't! Not while I'm at work...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0132
rows.name:
Right then! Today I shall polish the office directory and
anticipate more great work from all of our occupants.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0138
rows.name:
I had a chance to speak with Professor B for a few
moments when he arrived for a meeting the other day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0139
rows.name: I believe he may actually BE from the future![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0140
rows.name:
He talked about the universe, and history, and other
things that even Elma and the Ma-non don't know
about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018701_MSG0141
rows.name:
...Although he used lots of words I couldn't understand,
which is quite peculiar considering we can fully
comprehend every other xenoform.[ST:wait ]
